languages.text: "Разве не очевидно?" {n}Хротко высокомерно изгибает бровь.{/n} "Чтобы самому раскрыть заговор. Продемонстрировать {mf|Его|Ее} Светлости твою некомпетентность. Занять место, которого достоин. Я годами трудился на благо династии, но когда Мастер дисциплины погиб, мне отказали в повышении, выбрав тебя, зарвавшуюся суку из Зауэрбэков. Видимо, имя важнее способностей".

"Is it not obvious?" {n}Hrotko smugly arches an eyebrow.{/n} "To expose the conspiracy myself and to prove your incompetence to {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}. To take the place I actually deserve. For years, I toiled for the good of the dynasty, but when the former Master-at-Arms was killed, I was refused my promotion. Instead, they give the position to you, a self-serving Sauerback nit. I guess a noble name means more than talent."
languages.original_text: "Разве не очевидно?" {n}Хротко высокомерно изгибает бровь.{/n} "Чтобы самому раскрыть заговор. Продемонстрировать {mf|Его|Ее} Светлости твою некомпетентность. Занять место, которого достоин. Я годами трудился на благо династии, но когда Мастер дисциплины погиб, мне отказали в повышении, выбрав тебя, зарвавшуюся суку из Зауэрбэков. Видимо, имя важнее способностей".

traits.locale_text: "Is it not obvious?" {n}Hrotko arrogantly arches an eyebrow.{/n} "To expose the conspiracy myself and to prove your incompetence to {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}. To take the place I actually deserve. For years, I toiled for the good of the dynasty, but when the Master-at-Arms was killed, I was refused my promotion. Instead, they promoted you, a self-serving Sauerback nit. I guess a noble name means more than talent."

{n}Fear and hatred contort Hrotko's face.{/n} "To expose the conspiracy myself and prove your incompetence to {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}. For years I had toiled for the good of the dynasty, but when the Master-at-Arms was killed, I was refused my promotion. Instead, they promoted you, a self-entitled Sauerback nit. I guess a noble name means more than talent."

For years, I toiled for the good of the dynasty, but when the former Master-at-Arms was killed, I was refused my promotion. Instead, they give the position to you, a self-serving Sauerback nit. I guess a noble name means more than talent."

languages.text: « À votre avis ? {n}rétorque Hrotko en arquant un sourcil avec suffisance.{/n} Pour démasquer moi-même la conspiration et prouver votre incompétence à Sa Seigneurie. Pour obtenir enfin la place que je mérite. Des années durant, j'ai trimé sans relâche dans l'intérêt de la dynastie, mais quand le capitaine d'armes a été tué, c'est vous qui avez été promue à ma place. Oui, vous, une abrutie de Sauerback qui ne songe qu'à son propre intérêt. Comme s'il suffisait de porter un noble nom pour valoir mieux que les autres. »
languages.original_text: "Is it not obvious?" {n}Hrotko smugly arches an eyebrow.{/n} "To expose the conspiracy myself and to prove your incompetence to {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}. To take the place I actually deserve. For years, I toiled for the good of the dynasty, but when the former Master-at-Arms was killed, I was refused my promotion. Instead, they give the position to you, a self-serving Sauerback nit. I guess a noble name means more than talent."

traits.locale_text: « À votre avis ? {n}rétorque Hrotko en arquant un sourcil avec suffisance.{/n} Pour démasquer moi-même la conspiration et prouver votre incompétence à Sa Seigneurie. Pour obtenir enfin la place que je mérite. Des années durant, j'ai trimé sans relâche dans l'intérêt de la dynastie, mais quand le capitaine d'armes a été tué, c'est vous qui avez été promue à ma place. Oui, vous, une abrutie de Sauerback qui ne songe qu'à son propre intérêt. Comme s'il suffisait de porter un noble nom pour valoir mieux que les autres. »

languages.text: «¿Acaso no resulta obvio?». {n}Hrotko arquea arrogantemente la ceja.{/n} «Para exponer yo mismo la conspiración y demostrar tu incompetencia ante mi{mf|lord|lady}. Para ocupar el lugar que merezco. Me he dejado la piel durante años por el bien de la dinastía, pero cuando el anterior maestro de armas murió, me denegaron el ascenso. En vez de eso, te concedieron el cargo a ti, una lerda egoísta Sauerback. Supongo que el apellido noble vale más que el talento».
languages.original_text: "Is it not obvious?" {n}Hrotko smugly arches an eyebrow.{/n} "To expose the conspiracy myself and to prove your incompetence to {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}. To take the place I actually deserve. For years, I toiled for the good of the dynasty, but when the former Master-at-Arms was killed, I was refused my promotion. Instead, they give the position to you, a self-serving Sauerback nit. I guess a noble name means more than talent."

traits.locale_text: «¿Acaso no resulta obvio?». {n}Hrotko arquea arrogantemente la ceja.{/n} «Para exponer yo mismo la conspiración y demostrar tu incompetencia ante mi{mf|lord|lady}. Para ocupar el lugar que merezco. Me he dejado la piel durante años por el bien de la dinastía, pero cuando el anterior maestro de armas murió, me denegaron el ascenso. En vez de eso, te concedieron el cargo a ti, una lerda egoísta Sauerback. Supongo que el apellido noble vale más que el talento».

languages.text: “这不是很明显吗？”{n}赫洛卡得意洋洋地扬起了一条眉毛。{/n}“因为我打算亲自揭露真相，让舰长大人看到你有多么无能，让我得到本该属于我的职位。这么多年来，我一直在为王朝的利益辛勤工作，可当前任戒律大师遭到杀害时，他的继任者并不是我，而是你这个自私自利的家伙，苏尔贝克家族的渣滓。或许，是因为出身比才能更重要吧。”
languages.original_text: "Is it not obvious?" {n}Hrotko smugly arches an eyebrow.{/n} "To expose the conspiracy myself and to prove your incompetence to {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}. To take the place I actually deserve. For years, I toiled for the good of the dynasty, but when the former Master-at-Arms was killed, I was refused my promotion. Instead, they give the position to you, a self-serving Sauerback nit. I guess a noble name means more than talent."

traits.locale_text: “这不是很明显吗？”{n}赫洛卡得意洋洋地扬起了一条眉毛。{/n}“因为我打算亲自揭露真相，让舰长大人看到你有多么无能，让我得到本该属于我的职位。这么多年来，我一直在为王朝的利益辛勤工作，可当前任戒律大师遭到杀害时，他的继任者并不是我，而是你这个自私自利的家伙，苏尔贝克家族的渣滓。或许，是因为出身比才能更重要吧。”

languages.text: 「わかりきったことでしょう？」{n}フロトコが眉を顰める。{/n}「私自身で陰謀を暴き、あなたの無能さを閣下に証明するためですよ。ふさわしい地位を得るためにね。何年もの間、私は王朝のために尽力してきました。ですが、前任のマスター・アット・アームズが殺された際に、私の昇進はなくなってしまった。代わりに彼らが昇進させたのは、利己的なザウアーバックの卵のような、あなただった。この世では、高貴な名前は才能よりも重要なんですね」
languages.original_text: "Is it not obvious?" {n}Hrotko smugly arches an eyebrow.{/n} "To expose the conspiracy myself and to prove your incompetence to {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}. To take the place I actually deserve. For years, I toiled for the good of the dynasty, but when the former Master-at-Arms was killed, I was refused my promotion. Instead, they give the position to you, a self-serving Sauerback nit. I guess a noble name means more than talent."

traits.locale_text: 「わかりきったことでしょう？」{n}フロトコが眉を顰める。{/n}「私自身で陰謀を暴き、あなたの無能さを閣下に証明するためですよ。ふさわしい地位を得るためにね。何年もの間、私は王朝のために尽力してきました。ですが、前任のマスター・アット・アームズが殺された際に、私の昇進はなくなってしまった。代わりに彼らが昇進させたのは、利己的なザウアーバックの卵のような、あなただった。この世では、高貴な名前は才能よりも重要なんですね」

languages.text: "Ist das nicht offensichtlich?" {n}Hrotko hebt blasiert eine Augenbraue.{/n} "Um die Verschwörung selbst aufzudecken und {mf|seiner Lordschaft|ihrer Ladyschaft} Eure Inkompetenz zu beweisen. Um den Platz einzunehmen, der mir zusteht. Jahrelang habe ich mich für das Wohl der Dynastie aufgerieben, doch als der letzte Waffenmeister getötet wurde, verwehrte man mir die Beförderung. Stattdessen gaben sie Euch die Position, einer eigennützigen Sauerback. Ein adeliger Name ist offenbar wichtiger als Talent."
languages.original_text: "Is it not obvious?" {n}Hrotko smugly arches an eyebrow.{/n} "To expose the conspiracy myself and to prove your incompetence to {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}. To take the place I actually deserve. For years, I toiled for the good of the dynasty, but when the former Master-at-Arms was killed, I was refused my promotion. Instead, they give the position to you, a self-serving Sauerback nit. I guess a noble name means more than talent."

traits.locale_text: "Ist das nicht offensichtlich?" {n}Hrotko hebt blasiert eine Augenbraue.{/n} "Um die Verschwörung selbst aufzudecken und {mf|seiner Lordschaft|ihrer Ladyschaft} Eure Inkompetenz zu beweisen. Um den Platz einzunehmen, der mir zusteht. Jahrelang habe ich mich für das Wohl der Dynastie aufgerieben, doch als der letzte Waffenmeister getötet wurde, verwehrte man mir die Beförderung. Stattdessen gaben sie Euch die Position, einer eigennützigen Sauerback. Ein adeliger Name ist offenbar wichtiger als Talent."

languages.text: "Belli değil mi?" {n}Hrotko, kendini beğenmiş bir havayla kaşını kaldırıyor.{/n} "Komployu kendi başıma açığa çıkarıp {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'nin beceriksizliğini kanıtlamak için. Gerçekten hak ettiğim yere kavuşmak için. Yıllar boyunca hanedanlığın refahı için çalışıp durdum. Fakat bir önceki Silahtar öldürüldüğünde terfi almadım. Bunun yerine bu mevkiye Sauerback gibi bencilin tekini getirdiler. Soyluluk, beceriden daha mühim olsa gerek."
languages.original_text: "Is it not obvious?" {n}Hrotko smugly arches an eyebrow.{/n} "To expose the conspiracy myself and to prove your incompetence to {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}. To take the place I actually deserve. For years, I toiled for the good of the dynasty, but when the former Master-at-Arms was killed, I was refused my promotion. Instead, they give the position to you, a self-serving Sauerback nit. I guess a noble name means more than talent."
